Metadata.title: Preludio Lab | Closer to the Classics, More Joy in Every Note
Metadata.description: Deepen that spark of 'I love this piece.' Through interactive scores and audio, we bring you an experience that touches the heart of masterpieces. Join us for enriching moments where classical music becomes a constant companion in your life.

Common.notFoundDesc: The page you are looking for might have been removed, had its name changed, or is temporarily unavailable.

hero.title: Where You Find the Music You'll Love Forever.
hero.description: Discovering wonderful music is a treasure that gently colors your life. Trace the score and unravel the stories behind the sound. Preludio Lab is your guide to that 'perfect piece' that transforms your everyday life.

works.name: Works
works.desc: The stories behind masterpieces and moments that move you.

composers.name: Composers
composers.desc: The lives and passions of the musicians who colored their eras.

theory.name: Theory
theory.desc: Unlock the secrets of sound to enjoy listening even more.

eras.name: Eras
eras.desc: Feel the atmosphere of the times and bring music to life.

instruments.name: Instruments
instruments.desc: History and charm of the partners that weave the sound.

performers.name: Performers
performers.desc: Records of soul-stirring performances and expressions.

terminology.name: Terminology
terminology.desc: Messages from composers hidden within the score.

columns.name: Columns
columns.desc: Diverse readings to color your musical life.

originals.name: Originals
originals.desc: Original compositions presented by Preludio Lab.

Footer.tagline: Beyond Listening. Dive deeper into the classics.
